name: SUROS Regime
flavor_text: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

frame.name: SUROS Legacy
frame.description: The bottom half of each magazine deals bonus damage and has a chance to return health on kill.

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description: Holding down the trigger increases rate of fire.
perks.name: Spinning Up

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Hand-Laid Stock
